basic.blooming: Flowering period March-July, fruiting period July-December
basic.color: Flower color white, light yellow, fruit color green

maintenance.soil: Light clay and sandy loam with moderate fertility
maintenance.sunlight: Like moderate sunlight, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.fertilization: Need moderae amount of fertilization (every 2 month top-dressing once)
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
